p: When examining the number of viral particles detected in bodies and saliva ( Fig 5A–5C), no significant differences were found between AR wP and AR wP-M (Kruskal–Wallis test: P > 0.05). Regarding CHIKV, very low values of viral particles were found in AR wP-M saliva at 14 dpi and this value decreased to 0 at 21 dpi. Regarding DENV and ZIKV, viral particles were undetectable in the saliva of AR wP-M females at both dpi.
